Vous apprendrez les concepts de base, la syntaxe, et comment construire vos premiers programmes.`, objectives: [ 'Comprendre les bases de la programmation Python', 'MaÃ®triser les structures de contrÃ´le', 'Manipuler les structures de donnÃ©es', 'CrÃ©er des fonctions rÃ©utilisables', 'GÃ©rer les erreurs et exceptions' ], chapters: [ { id: 1, title: 'Introduction Ã  Python', duration: '45 min', lessons: [ { id: 1, title: 'Qu\'est-ce que Python ?', duration: '15 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 2, title: 'Installation et configuration', duration: '20 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 3, title: 'Premier programme', duration: '10 min', type: 'practice', completed: false } ] }, { id: 2, title: 'Variables et Types de DonnÃ©es', duration: '1h 30min', lessons: [ { id: 4, title: 'Variables et assignation', duration: '20 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 5, title: 'Types de donnÃ©es de base', duration: '25 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 6, title: 'Exercices pratiques', duration: '45 min', type: 'practice', completed: false } ] }, { id: 3, title: 'Structures de ContrÃ´le', duration: '2h 15min', lessons: [ { id: 7, title: 'Conditions if/else', duration: '30 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 8, title: 'Boucles for et while', duration: '35 min', type: 'video', completed: false }, { id: 9, title: 'Exercices avancÃ©s', duration: '70 min', type: 'practice', completed: false } ] } ], resources: [ { type: 'pdf', title: 'Guide de rÃ©fÃ©rence Python', size: '2.4 MB' }, { type: 'code', title: 'Exercices supplÃ©mentaires', size: '1.1 MB' }, { type: 'cheatsheet', title: 'Aide-mÃ©moire syntaxe', size: '0.8 MB' } ] };
